name: Data Recovery Group
tag_list: data, recover, recovery, server, servers, nas, san, raid, encrypted-data, linux, unix, sun, novell, outlook, email, hard-drive, pc, windows, apple, mac, desktop, external-hard-drive, camera-card, sd-card, cf-card, compact-flash-card, laptop-hard-drive, fl
overview:
Data Recovery Group focuses on recovering data from damaged or failed hard drives for individuals, businesses, and enterprise-level corporations.

Data Recovery Group specializes in recovering your valuable computer data quickly, safely, and securely. We have extensive experience with Windows / PC data recovery, Apple / Mac data recovery, and other operating systems as well. Simply send us your desktop drive , laptop drive or external drive so we can start recovering your data today. We are also able to recover data from cameras and flash drives in some cases.

Data Recovery Group’s Business Data Recovery Team is standing by to help you rebuild that critical business data. Whether your needs are RAID Recovery, NAS / SAN Recovery, Encrypted Data Recovery, recovery of a Linux / Unix / Sun / Novell system, or something more complex, Data Recovery Group has you covered and can handle your server data recovery needs with ease.
